resources.string:
Welcome to GuitaraokeLeader!
 1. You will share your WiFi hotspot. Be sure to change the mobile mode to *2G only* to avoid big internet bills.
 2. Change the name of your WiFi hotspot to *GuitaraokeLeader* and set the password to *guitaraoke3.3*.
 3. Show the QR codes to your followers.
 This app is safe, it can read and write only from the folder you will give it permission in the next step.
